content.value:
Love to read our house buying contract (@TheLawSociety) and see that the buyer and seller are referred to throughout as he/him/his 🙃🙃🙃

They/them/theirs is not only gender neutral, but also accommodates multiple buyers/sellers better. Change it please? 🙏🏼
content.html: Love to read our house buying contract (@TheLawSociety) and see that the buyer and seller are referred to throughout as he/him/his 🙃🙃🙃 They/them/theirs is not only gender neutral, but also accommodates multiple buyers/sellers better. Change it please? 🙏🏼
